channel.title: CVE Feed for LogicHunt -- OWL Carousel – WordPress Owl Carousel Slider
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LogicHunt -- OWL Carousel – WordPress Owl Carousel Slider

item.title: CVE-2024-24801|2024-02-10T07:53:36.601Z -- LogicHunt -- OWL Carousel – WordPress Owl Carousel Slider
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in LogicHunt OWL Carousel – WordPress Owl Carousel Slider allows Stored XSS.This issue affects OWL Carousel – WordPress Owl Carousel Slider: from n/a through 1.4.0.
